title: sa_aṣṭāvakragītā

<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
<head>aṣṭāvakragītā</head>

<milestone unit='speaker' n='janaka uvāca'/>
<lg xml:id='Avg_1.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ jñānam avāpto 'ti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ muktir bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vairāgyaṃ ca kathaṃ prāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etad brūhi mama prabho</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kathaṃ jñānam avāpto 'ti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ muktir bhaviṣyati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vairāgyaṃ ca kathaṃ prāptam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etad brūhi mama prabho</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>


<milestone unit='speaker' n='aṣṭāvakra uvāca'/>
<lg xml:id='Avg_1.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muktim icchasi cet tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣayān viṣavat tyaja</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣamārjavadayātoṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyaṃ pīyūṣavad bhaja</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muktim icchasi cet tāta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>viṣayān viṣavat tyaja</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṣamārjavadayātoṣa</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyaṃ pīyūṣavad bhaja</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na pṛthvī na jalaṃ nāgnir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vāyur dyaur na vā bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣāṃ sākṣiṇam ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cidrūpaṃ viddhi muktaye</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na pṛthvī na jalaṃ nāgnir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na vāyur dyaur na vā bhavān</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>eṣāṃ sākṣiṇam ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cid-rūpaṃ viddhi muktaye</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi dehaṃ pṛthak kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citi viśrāmya tiṣṭhasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunaiva sukhī śānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandhamukto bhaviṣyasi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yadi dehaṃ pṛthak kṛtya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>citi viśrāmya tiṣṭhasi</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>adhunaiva sukhī śānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bandha-mukto bhaviṣyasi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tvaṃ viprādiko varṇo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāśramī nākṣagocaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṅgo 'si nirākāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvasākṣī sukhī bhava</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tvaṃ viprādiko varṇo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nāśramī nākṣa-gocaraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṅgo 'si nirākāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśva-sākṣī sukhī bhava</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmādharmau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mānasāni na te vibho</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kartāsi na bhoktāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukta evāsi sarvadā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dharmādharmau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mānasāni na te vibho</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na kartāsi na bhoktāsi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukta evāsi sarvadā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eko draṣṭāsi sarvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>muktaprāyo 'si sarvadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam eva hi te bandho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>draṣṭāraṃ paśyasītaram</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eko draṣṭāsi sarvasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mukta-prāyo 'si sarvadā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam eva hi te bandho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>draṣṭāraṃ paśyasītaram</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ kartety ahaṃmāna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahākṛṣṇāhidaṃśitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāhaṃ karteti viśvāsā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛtaṃ pītvā sukhī bhava</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaṃ kartety ahaṃ-māna</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>mahā-kṛṣṇāhi-daṃśitaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nāhaṃ karteti viśvāsā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>-mṛtaṃ pītvā sukhī bhava</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eko viśuddhabodho 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti niścayavahninā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajvālyājñānagahanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vītasokaḥ sukhī bhava</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>eko viśuddha-bodho 'ham</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti niścaya-vahninā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prajvālyājñāna-gahanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vīta-sokaḥ sukhī bhava</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra viśvam idaṃ bhāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalpitaṃ rajjusarpavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ānandaparamānandaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa bodhas tvaṃ sukhaṃ cara</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra viśvam idaṃ bhāti</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalpitaṃ rajju-sarpavat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ānanda-paramānandaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sa bodhas tvaṃ sukhaṃ cara</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muktābhimānī mukto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddho baddhābhimāny api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ vadantīha satye 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā matiḥ sā gatir bhavet</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>muktābhimānī mukto hi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>baddho baddhābhimāny api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kiṃ vadantīha satye 'yaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yā matiḥ sā gatir bhavet</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmā sākṣī vibhuḥ pūrṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eko muktaś cid akriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṅgo nispṛhaḥ śānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhramāt saṃsāravān iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmā sākṣī vibhuḥ pūrṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eko muktaś cid akriyaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asaṅgo nispṛhaḥ śānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhramāt saṃsāravān iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kūṭasthaṃ bodham advaitam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmānaṃ paribhāvaya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ābhāso 'haṃ bhramaṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvaṃ bāhyam athāntaraṃ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kūṭasthaṃ bodham advaitam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ātmānaṃ paribhāvaya</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ābhāso 'haṃ bhramaṃ muktvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhāvaṃ bāhyam athāntaraṃ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dehābhimānapāśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ baddho 'si putraka</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bodho 'haṃ jñānakhaḍgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan niṣkṛtya sukhī bhava</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dehābhimāna-pāśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ciraṃ baddho 'si putraka</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bodho 'haṃ jñāna-khaḍgena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tan niṣkṛtya sukhī bhava</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niḥsaṅgo niṣkriyo 'si tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svaprakāśo nirañjanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam eva hi te bandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samādhim anutiṣṭhasi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>niḥsaṅgo niṣkriyo 'si tvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sva-prakāśo nirañjanaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ayam eva hi te bandhaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samādhim anutiṣṭhasi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā vyāptam idaṃ viśvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayi protaṃ yathārthataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śudddhabuddhasvarūpas tvaṃ,</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā gamaḥ kṣudracittatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā vyāptam idaṃ viśvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayi protaṃ yathārthataḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śudddha-buddha-svarūpas tvaṃ,</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mā gamaḥ kṣudra-cittatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirapekṣo nirvikāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirbharaḥ śītalāśayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agādhabuddhir akṣubdho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhava cinmātravāsanaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nirapekṣo nirvikāro</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirbharaḥ śītalāśayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>agādha-buddhir akṣubdho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhava cin-mātra-vāsanaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sākāram anṛtaṃ viddhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirākāraṃ tu niścalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etattattvopadeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na punarbhavasambhavaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sākāram anṛtaṃ viddhi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirākāraṃ tu niścalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etat-tattvopadeśena</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na punar-bhava-sambhavaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathaivādarśam adhyasthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpe 'ntaḥ paritas tu saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathaivāsmin śarīre 'ntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritaḥ parameśvaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathaivādarśam adhyasthe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rūpe 'ntaḥ paritas tu saḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathaivāsmin śarīre 'ntaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritaḥ parameśvaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_1.20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaṃ sarvagataṃ vyoma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahir antar yathā ghaṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityaṃ nirantaraṃ brahma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarvabhūtagaṇe tathā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_1.20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ekaṃ sarva-gataṃ vyoma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bahir antar yathā ghaṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nityaṃ nirantaraṃ brahma</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarva-bhūta-gaṇe tathā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>




<milestone unit='speaker' n='janaka uvāca'/>
<lg xml:id='Avg_2.1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho nirañjanaḥ śānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bodho 'haṃ prakṛteḥ paraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mohenaiva viḍambitaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_2.1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aho nirañjanaḥ śānto</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bodho 'haṃ prakṛteḥ paraḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>etāvantam ahaṃ kālaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mohenaiva viḍambitaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_2.2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā prakāśayāmy eko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deham enaṃ tathā jagat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ato mama jagat sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>athavā na ca kiṃcana</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_2.2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā prakāśayāmy eko</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>deham enaṃ tathā jagat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ato mama jagat sarvam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>athavā na ca kiṃcana</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_2.3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saśarīram aho viśvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parityajya mayādhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutaścit kauśalād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paramātmā vilokyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_2.3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>saśarīram aho viśvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parityajya mayādhunā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kutaścit kauśalād eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paramātmā vilokyate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_2.4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā na toyato bhinnās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṅgāḥ phenabudbudāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmano na tathā bhinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvam ātmavinirgatam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_2.4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathā na toyato bhinnās</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>taraṅgāḥ phena-budbudāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmano na tathā bhinnaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>viśvam ātma-vinirgatam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_2.5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tantumātro bhaved eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭo yadvad vicāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātmatanmatram evedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadvad viśvaṃ vicāritam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_2.5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tantu-mātro bhaved eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paṭo yadvad vicāritaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ātma-tanmatram evedaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tadvad viśvaṃ vicāritam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Avg_2.6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathaivekṣurase kḷptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena vyāptaiva śarkarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā viśvaṃ mayi kḷptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā vyāptaṃ nirantaram</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Avg_2.6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yathaivekṣu-rase kḷptā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tena vyāptaiva śarkarā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā viśvaṃ mayi kḷptaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayā vyāptaṃ nirantaram</seg> //</l>
</lg>
